name: The Great Space Exploration
description:
***A game made during Extra Credits Game Jam #3***

It's the exploration age, again! Now it's time for mankind to explore further into the space. What awaits at this end of this adventure? Or would it even end?

CONTROLS

  • Use mouse to aim the rocket and right mouse click to launch the rocket.
  • Press Q to exit Endless Mode.

CREDITS

  • Game design/Programming: NowPlaying
  • Art: Kuang-Yu
  • Music: Amerlyn
  • Additional Programming: juunishi master
